item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“xa0sluke, post:4, topic:314983”][quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=411429.msg3034825#msg3034825 date=1258658642]
so much fail, figure it out yourself like everyone else.
[/quote]
Erm, define ‘everyone else’? Bugs are very easy to not notice, hence why BETA testing was invented. Zilent could completely re-build the source and forget to patch up something he didn’t know was a problem, I’d much sooner ask a few (helpful) people on here and get some knowledge on the common RSCD bugs. If you’ve got nothing constructive to say why even bother posting?

Implying that it’s going to come back up, so in a way, yes you’re advertising.

Everyone on here knows about RSCEmulation, there’s a 18 page thread about it in advertisements. Believe it or not, I’m not trying to advertise RSCEmulation in this thread.

255* and what the hell is the point of that?

Zilent is fussy (as am I), and he wants to do everything the way he would have done it. He’s basically re-writing it in all honesty. Someone attacked us by sending un-handled packets and he said it was easier for him to understand if he just re-did them.[/quote]

RSCEmulation RSCEmulation RSCEmulation RSCEmulation RSCEmulation RSCEmulation RSCEmulation

Going to say it enough? < Advertising.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

My little server is down, and has been for a week. Why would I advertise something that is down?
I run RSCEmulation now and the source code we've been using has always been a modified version of a modified RSCD (if that makes sense). Zilent joined our team a month ago and recently took over as the lead developer, and we've started fresh with RSCD v25.

Implying that it’s going to come back up, so in a way, yes you’re advertising.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

[quote=“xa0sluke, post:2, topic:314983”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=411429.msg3034451#msg3034451 date=1258620653]
Another ploy to advertise your little server.
[/quote]
My little server is down, and has been for a week. Why would I advertise something that is down?

-Trade Dupe = KO9 posted the fix for it, but i bet you allready got it fixed.
-Duel Dupe = KO9 posted the fix for it, but i bet you allready got it fixed.
-Make yourself admin
-Packet sendings
-Secure the ls = Hixk posted the fix for it.

– Admins which abuse and give items to players/Friends. ( THIS IS THE BIGGEST PROBLEM IN SERVERS )

you probably have these fixed allready, but i listed it anyway.

Btw, Irc0p can these things, ask him…

Nope, we haven’t started on anything like that yet. Zilent has just been sorting stability issues and completely removing the LS as well as multi-threading everything. He’s also re-organised all the packets in a logical order rather than them being at random between 0 and 253 (ish).

Cheers for the list. Have you got a link to the fixes so I can have a look over them? I’ve gone through 10 pages of Server Development so far with no luck.[/quote]

255* and what the hell is the point of that?

Read full topic

#The_AFKer its not only for “HIM” as you think, its good for all as i see it , because you can fix your own dupes/bugs which exist in rscd source, i mean if you have problem or wonder about a dupe/bug, then you can probably find your fix in here or what ever…

Well yes he own a server, but dont see it as its ONLY for him and his server, its for all at moparscape.
